title: Braes o' Balquhidder. A novel
author: Aytoun, Douglas.
snippet: Accordingly, in his twentieth year, Jack Craigie became a pupil of Mr. Romanes, the tenant of NiddryMains, a farm of some 500 acres situated about tenmiles west of Edinburgh.

title: Braes o' Balquhidder. A novel
author: Aytoun, Douglas.
snippet: The outcome of that evening's sitting in Mr. Leslie'ssanctum was the transference of Jack from NiddryMains to the Meadows, and his daily attendance at thestudio of a well-known training artist in the near vicinity.
